verbs.description: slow cooker [V: stuffed] [ARG1: shells] there no need to precook the shells in this simple pasta dish it almost like magic when you open the lid and find the deliciousness waiting in the slow cooker add garlic bread and you 're golden —sherry day pinckney michigan
